text.value: select count(*) as total_count from @{pipeline().parameters.schema}.@{pipeline().parameters.table} where last_updated > '@{if(empty(pipeline().parameters.backdate),activity('Last_CDC').output.value[0].cdc_timestamp,pipeline().parameters.backdate)}'
